alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 22 at 7:08PM CDT until July 22 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ELLSWORTH AND WESTERN SALINE COUNTIES... At 708 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brookville, or 12 miles west of Salina, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Salina, Brookville, Smolan, Falun, Glendale, Kanopolis State Park and Kanopolis Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
